Required_Skills: Chartered Accountant with 8+ years of experience in financial management
Preferred_Skills: Proficiency in financial software (e.g., QuickBooks, Zoho or similar)
Strong analytical skills and detail orientation. Ability to interpret data, generate and communicate insights. Proficient in advanced Microsoft Excel techniques.

Ability to work independently, maintain confidentiality and collaborate effectively in a team environment.
